column4: Having some problems with my display. Intermittent. Starts up fine 50% of the time, and the rest it has some pretty weird pixelation ( if you could call it that ) going on. Looks like someone smudged the screen. Any help, please?
how is that related to Ubuntu? try the monitor on another system
It has only started doing that since I upgraded from 9.10 to 10.04
With Karmic, the desktop part was just black at a res of 1400x1050, until I added some lines to the xorg.conf file
